description.value: You can use your magic to transform into a small creature of a type that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar, potentially allowing you to safely scout for your party while retaining a degree of spellcasting ability. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Familiar Form] focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
